page.title: 18Family Life.
page.content: Last{Sunday}we all went to{Church}in Maidenhead and then we stayed for Pathfinders. After that we came home to clean the house because{visitors} were coming. We tidied our rooms and I played cricket until they arrived. We had fun in the garden and the two dogs were let out to romp about with us. It was then time for lunch which was chicken wrapped in bacon with spinach, carrots and peas. For a short while we watched the{television}and then we went for a{walk}through the woods and we took the dogs with us. Along the path in the woods we came to a stream. We went on a little further then we returned to our house. We decided to watch the television again and then it was time for our visitors to go home. After they had left we went outside and did some{gardening. }
